name: Datalog Educational System
short_description: The Datalog Educational System (DES) is a deductive database with Datalog, Relational Algebra and SQL as query languages developed mainly for education. It can be used from most common Prolog interpreters over any supported OS and from portable executables (Windows, Linux and MacOS).
summary: Deductive Database with Datalog, Relational Algebra and SQL
